mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT(CUS_EMAIL, CUS_NAME, CUS_PW, CUS_JOB, CUS_FIELD, CUS_INTEREST, CUS_SENDEMAIL) VALUES(#{cus_email}, #{cus_name}, #{cus_pw}, #{cus_job}, #{cus_field}, #{cus_interest}, #{cus_sendemail} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT WHERE CUS_EMAIL = #{cus_email} AND CUS_PW = #{cus_pw}
